About logotypes and Ribbons

Using DNA double helix as a motif, our logo represents continuous connection between “Atom(materials)” and “Bit(information)” by shape transition from double helix to stripes.

Download

You can download the DBCLS logos from the link below and use them without permission. Please note that any modification is not allowed.

Color Monotone
logomark png svg ai(RGB) ai(CMYK) png svg ai
logomark + Japanese text png svg ai(RGB) ai(CMYK) png svg ai
logomark + English text (shortened) png svg ai(RGB) ai(CMYK) png svg ai
logomark + English text png svg ai(RGB) ai(CMYK) png svg ai
All types png svg ai(RGB) ai(CMYK) png svg ai

Ribbons

It would be greatly appreciated if you displayed the ribbon below on your websites/services created based on DBCLS services or BioHackathon activities.
